peptide.cite: Please cite Norine: a database of nonribosomal peptide, Caboche et Al., Nucleic Acids Research 2008; 36:D326-D331

general.name: actinomycin II
general.synonyms: actinomycin A2, actinomycin B2, actinomycin F8
general.comment: If sarcosine is added to the medium, the micro-organism produces, in addition to actinomycins D and I, actinomycin II and actinomycin III, characterized by the substitution by sarcosine of one or both the proline molecules present in actinomycin D.
